short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clears the Downloads list every 10 seconds to force the download bar to disappear when all downloads are complete

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlike others, this extension uses Chrome events instead of scripts that run constantly, which means less performance drag.
